short_videos.video_description:
Larry the log loves the water. Always has, always will.

Larry is always the life of the party who enjoys a nice rain cocktail and a good punchline. People are sometimes startled when they first meet him, since you typically don‚Äôt meet an energetic, joke-telling log every day. With a natural gift for storytelling and a magnetic personality, there‚Äôs never a dull moment when Larry‚Äôs around! How he got his signature cheeky personality is a bit of a mystery‚Ä¶ but since he was born in an enchanted forest, magic isn‚Äôt out of the question. 

Larry spent his early days in the forest hanging out with Astrid, Tom, and Miso, entertaining them with armpit farts and his grand, dramatic stories that may or may not be true. He‚Äôs since branched out (pun intended) to explore as much of the world as he can, but he‚Äôs always careful to avoid places where campfires are a possibility.
